Finland inaugurates Alexander Stubb as president for the NATO eraAlexander Stubb took office as Finland's president on Friday, ready to oversee a new era after it joined NATO in response to neighbouring Russia's invasion of Ukraine. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 10:33:25 GMT SLSF2VTGHBMSZGT32ELIJDEUXOY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/finland-inaaugurates-alexander-stubb-nato-president-era-2024-03-01/Anne Kauranen世界欧洲
Kremlin says any unsanctioned gathering for Navalny will violate the lawThe Kremlin said that any unsanctioned gatherings in support of the late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, who is to be buried on Friday in Moscow, will violate the law. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 10:32:35 GMT BIR4CPSGTVJ5TDIFK3PHX5UBD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kremlin-says-any-unsanctioned-gathering-by-navalny-will-violate-law-2024-03-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Myanmar junta's access to arms, cash must be cut off, UN rights chief saysThe international community must take "targeted action" to restrict the Myanmar junta's access to arms, jet fuel and foreign currency to prevent it from committing "atrocities" against its people, the U.N. human rights chief said on Friday. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 09:55:36 GMT LOAMF3WRN5IKPNW5 仪器https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-joint-access-arms-cash-must-be-cut-off-un-rights-chief-says-2024-03-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Artillery shelling kills 12 in Myanmar market, injures 80 - rebel militiaAt least 12 civilians were killed in Myanmar when artillery shells landed in a busy market in western Rakhine State, as the ruling military and anti-junta forces traded blame for the latest violence to rock the Southeast Asian country. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 09:20:10 GMT ADMKQWRLBOJZC5Q4BV5SLEZAI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/artillery-shelling-kills-12-myanmar-market-injures-80-rebel-militia-2024-03-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Malaysia may permanently waive rules for foreign ships working on undersea cablesMalaysia has decided to reverse an earlier decision and allow foreign vessels to repair undersea cables in its waters, its transport minister said on Friday, adding the move may be made permanent to encourage tech investments and support the digital economy. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 07:49:32 GMT VYRIANE4LZN33F4OUL2ZFXNB3I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysia-reinstates-cabotage-waiver-foreign-ships-undersea-cable-repair-2024-03-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's parliament to unveil more stimulus next week, bold reforms unlikelyChina's parliament is expected to unveil moderate stimulus plans to stabilise growth at an annual meeting beginning on Tuesday, but may disappoint those calling for a detailed roadmap of bold policies to fix the country's deep structural imbalances. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 06:10:37 GMT 5BJFCA57N5MILBHXB5HZY3QVIA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-parliament-unveils-more-stimulus-next-week-ball-reforms-unlikely-2024-03-01/Kevin Yao世界中国
Singapore's air force to add more stealth fighters as it phases out older jetsSingapore will buy eight more F-35 stealth fighters, eventually replacing its older F-16s and putting the Singaporean air force "in the premier league" as regional threats grow, the city-state's defence minister said this week. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 06:09:58 GMT BYTH2TPWAJIKLIYOWGSU2D6ZHM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/singapore-air-force-add-more-stealth-fighters-it-phases-out-older-jets-2024-03-01/Gerry Doyle世界亚太地区
Honduras moves to exit World Bank arbitration bodyHonduras on Thursday took steps to exit a World Bank settlement body that is assessing a dispute with an autonomous zone claiming close to $10.8 billion in compensation from the government for alleged damages. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 05:23:27 GMT YIO4OQVJGRL7NOIP3JTNN46O7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/honduras-moves-exit-world-bank- Arbitration-body-2024-03-01/Reuters世界美洲
What causes Bangladesh's major industrial accidents?At least 44 people died and 22 were critically injured in the Bangladesh capital of Dhaka after a massive blaze broke out in a biryani restaurant to rage through a six-storey building. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 05:21:58 GMT DGXMF6WSANMSXB2YKUCNBGX3L4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/what-c​​auses-bangladeshs-major-industrial-accidents-2024-03-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russia ready to hand over crash victims' bodies to Ukraine, official saysRussia is ready to hand over the bodies of the victims of a January military plane crash to Ukraine, the RIA news agency cited Russian human rights official Tatyana Moskalkova as saying on Friday. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 05:02:43 GMT AABSTWSZSVJWZDKUMKVH7EOECA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-ready-hand-over-crash-victims-bodies-ukraine-ria-says-2024-03-01/Reuters世界欧洲
South Korea's Yoon says better Japan ties helping deter North Korea threatSouth Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol said on Friday improved ties with Japan were helping to combat threats from Pyongyang's weapons developments and called for help from the international community to bring about unification with North Korea. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 03:44:19 GMT CJN46T4XF5MMRNKPNWIATL54EE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-yoon-says-better-japan-ties-helping-deter-north-korea-threat-2024-03-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
